section.title: The List Agreement Item Supplier Products help screen
section.para: This screen is used to link a specific product (or range of products) to an agreement. This can be useful for restricting a discount or product pricing to a product (or range of products) for a particular supplier.
NOTE: Products created here will be linked to the product and can be view using Catalog Manager. Entries can be viewed under the Product 'Suppliers' and 'Agreements' tabs.

section.title: How do I add a product to an agreement item?

listitem.para: The 'Edit Agreement Item Product' screen is displayed
Manually enter or use the lookup to select the 'Product Id'
Using the drop down box select the 'Supplier Order Pref Id'
Enter any other details as required or leave blank

section.title: How do I update a product linked to an agreement item?

listitem.para: Select the product required by clicking on the 'Product Id'
The 'Edit Agreement Item Product' screen is displayed

section.title: How do I delete a product from an agreement item?

listitem.para: Press the 'Remove' button on the entry that needs to be deleted
